name: Cotton Candy Carnival
description:
Going a carnival is a fun experience for almost anyone. One of the most enjoyable foods at the carnival is cotton candy! If you've ever wondered what it would be like and/or how it's made -- then wonder no longer!

In this game you have the opportunity to make tons and tons of different flavors and shapes of cotton candy. Add as many toppings as you want, change the background that your cotton candy has to make it pop out more and even eat your cotton candy! This is a must have game for all of those cotton candy lovers out there.
